trans-unit.source: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.
trans-unit.target: 容器時間表，提供目標設為其子動畫資訊的物件和屬性。

trans-unit.source: Interactively Controlling Storyboards
trans-unit.target: 以互動方式控制的分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在標記中，您指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>物件，會建立; 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結和動畫時間軸

trans-unit.source: Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的時間軸屬性可以是資料繫結或以動畫顯示。不過，由於計時系統的運作的方式，繫結或動畫時間軸行為不像其他資料的資料繫結，或建立動畫的物件。

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解其行為，它有助於了解啟用時間軸的意義。

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: 啟動的時間軸時，會在時間軸和子時刻表製作複本。

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: 這些複本會凍結 （對唯讀） 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>從中建立物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘會執行以動畫顯示目標屬性的實際工作。

trans-unit.source: If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結或動畫效果，其目前值的快照集建立時做時鐘時間表。

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: 即使原始時間軸可能繼續變更，其時鐘卻不符合。

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created.
trans-unit.target: 時間表反映資料繫結或動畫變更其時鐘必須重新建立。

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not re-created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘不會重新建立為您自動。

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes:
trans-unit.target: 以下是幾種可套用時間軸變更的方式︰

trans-unit.source: If the timeline is or belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果時間表是或屬於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，您可以將它重新套用其分鏡腳本使用反映變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: 這也會一併重新啟動動畫。

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼中，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>前進分鏡腳本方法回它先前的位置。

trans-unit.source: If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果您動畫直接套用到屬性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>方法一次，並將它傳遞已修改的動畫。

trans-unit.source: If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在直接在時鐘層級，建立和套用一組新的時鐘和使用它們來取代先前組建立的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: 如範例的資料繫結動畫，請參閱 <<c0> [ 金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the set of animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 啟始與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的一組動畫。

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace>遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: Storyboards started with this method cannot be paused, resumed, or otherwise interactively controlled after they are started.
trans-unit.target: 無法暫停、 繼續，或其他互動方式控制會在啟動之後開始使用這個方法的分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從此分鏡腳本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a storyboard to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用分鏡腳本動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>'s name scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>內含<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>的名稱範圍。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace>遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: Storyboards started with this method cannot be paused, resumed, or otherwise interactively controlled after they are started.
trans-unit.target: 無法暫停、 繼續，或其他互動方式控制會在啟動之後開始使用這個方法的分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從此分鏡腳本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果腳本應該要以互動方式控制，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace>遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須指定相同`containingObject`互動的方法呼叫時，您用來開始分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何時間軸會建立物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 會與儲存在這些時鐘`containingObject`。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>'s name scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>內含<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>的名稱範圍。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: 新動畫的行為應用來與任何目前的動畫進行互動。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />，將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源，而計時系統則否自動移除這些時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> to animate when the user left-clicks, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> when the user right-clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>以動畫方式顯示，當使用者 left-clicks，而<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.

trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace>遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 會與儲存在這些時鐘`containingObject`。

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: 新動畫的行為應用來與任何目前的動畫進行互動。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />，將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> to animate when the user left-clicks, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> when the user right-clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>以動畫方式顯示，當使用者 left-clicks，而<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.target: 不具有所指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: 新動畫的行為應用來與任何目前的動畫進行互動。

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) once started.
trans-unit.target: 宣告在動畫啟動後，是否可以控制 (暫停) 該動畫。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />，將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用指定的遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須指定相同`containingObject`互動的方法呼叫時，您用來開始分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何時間軸會建立物件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源，而計時系統則否自動移除這些時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a controllable storyboard to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用可控制的分鏡腳本動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>'s name scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect>內含<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>的名稱範圍。

trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含在與這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有所指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: 新動畫的行為應用來與任何目前的動畫進行互動。

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) once started.
trans-unit.target: 宣告在動畫啟動後，是否可以控制 (暫停) 該動畫。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 將與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 相關聯的動畫套用至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動式方法的參數

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何時間軸會建立物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 會與儲存在這些時鐘`containingObject`。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源，而計時系統則否自動移除這些時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個方式可移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a controllable storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何建立可控制的分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: The next example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> to animate when the user left-clicks, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> when the user right-clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>以動畫方式顯示，當使用者 left-clicks，而<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the specified <c>frameworkTemplate</c> has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 已套用所指定 <c>frameworkTemplate</c> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> are applied to <c>containingObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 不具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName" /> 的動畫才會套用至 <c>containingObject</c>。

trans-unit.source: The template to animate.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示動畫的範本。

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: 新動畫的行為應用來與任何目前的動畫進行互動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果腳本應該要以互動方式控制，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A> when creating new instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class for the various cloning methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在內部呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>時建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>複製的各種方法的類別 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範典型實作<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Every <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> subclass must implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 每個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />子類別必須實作這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Typical implementation is to simply call the class default constructor and return the result.
trans-unit.target: 一般的實作會直接呼叫類別預設建構函式，並傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>速度是在其目前行進的速率，與實際時間相比較。

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本的時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or <see langword="null" /> if this clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 這個時鐘在其目前使用中週期內的目前反覆運算，如果時鐘已停止，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。

trans-unit.source: If this storyboard has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個分鏡腳本<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>設定`true`，完整的反覆項目是由正向反向組所組成，不只是下列其中一種區段。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentIteration" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentIteration" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or <see langword="null" /> if this clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 這個時鐘在其目前使用中週期內的目前反覆運算，如果時鐘已停止，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。

trans-unit.source: If this clock's timeline has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個時鐘時間表具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>設定`true`，完整的反覆項目是由正向反向組所組成，不只是下列其中一種區段。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: 其目前的反覆項目，不論搜尋時鐘傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動時鐘也會傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if this clock is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />, or 0.0 if this clock is active and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this clock within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個時鐘是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。如果這個時鐘在使用中且其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />，則為 0.0，否則為介於 0.0 與 1.0 之間的值，這個值表示這個時鐘在其目前反覆運算內的目前進度。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.0 表示沒有進度，而值 1.0 表示時鐘已到目前反覆運算的結尾。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Boolean)" /> 方法時指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含針對這個腳本及其子系所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if this clock is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />, or 0.0 if this clock is active and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this clock within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個時鐘是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。如果這個時鐘在使用中且其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />，則為 0.0，否則為介於 0.0 與 1.0 之間的值，這個值表示這個時鐘在其目前反覆運算內的目前進度。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.0 表示沒有進度，而值 1.0 表示時鐘已到目前反覆運算的結尾。

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本的時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取之前為這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState" /> 建立之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: The current state of the clock created for this storyboard: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />.
trans-unit.target: 為這個腳本建立之時鐘的目前狀態：<see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Active" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Filling" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState.Stopped" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not tell you whether a storyboard is paused.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會告訴您是否已暫停分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a storyboard is paused, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.GetIsPaused%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否要暫停分鏡腳本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.GetIsPaused%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本的時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本的時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetProperty%2A> was set in markup, this method returns an empty <xref:System.Windows.PropertyPath> because the property reference is resolved and stored internally when it is parsed.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 暫停為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> that was created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 暫停為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會暫停分鏡腳本，但沒有任何差別作用，如果不是作用中或目前已暫停。

trans-unit.source: As a side effect, all associated children are also paused.
trans-unit.target: 副作用，也會暫停所有相關聯的子系。

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Storyboard
trans-unit.target: 從已暫停的分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: When you <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: 當您<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>已暫停的分鏡腳本，出現繼續並重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: However, that is not what actually happens.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這是不實際發生的狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method actually replaces the paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> with a new unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法實際上會取代已暫停<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>新版未暫停。

trans-unit.source: Each time the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>呼叫方法時，會建立的分鏡腳本的時鐘物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘發佈至所建立動畫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: So, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法會呼叫一次，不會重新啟動其時鐘，則會取代新時鐘。

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> 方法時指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含針對這個腳本及其子系所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 暫停與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 關聯之指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: This method pauses the storyboard, but has no discernible effect if it is not active or currently paused.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會暫停分鏡腳本，但沒有任何差別作用，如果不是作用中或目前已暫停。

trans-unit.source: As a side effect, all associated children are also paused.
trans-unit.target: 副作用，也會暫停所有相關聯的子系。

trans-unit.source: Seeking a paused storyboard does not resume it.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋已暫停的分鏡腳本才會繼續它。

trans-unit.source: The only way to resume a paused storyboard is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續暫停的分鏡腳本的唯一方式是使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Resume%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method again replaces the paused storyboard with a new one, which has the appearance of resuming it.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法一次會暫停的分鏡腳本，取代為新的、 具有回復它的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動式方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: Fro an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 從範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Pausing a storyboard's clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: 暫停的分鏡腳本的時鐘觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Storyboard
trans-unit.target: 從已暫停的分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: When you <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: 當您<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>已暫停的分鏡腳本，出現繼續並重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: However, that is not what actually happens.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這是不實際發生的狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法實際上會本身未暫停的版本取代。

trans-unit.source: Each time the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>呼叫方法時，會建立的分鏡腳本的時鐘物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘發佈至所建立動畫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: So, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法會呼叫一次，不會重新啟動其時鐘，則會取代新時鐘。

trans-unit.target: 暫停的分鏡腳本的時鐘觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Storyboard
trans-unit.target: 從已暫停的分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: When you <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> a storyboard that was paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: 當您<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>已暫停的分鏡腳本，出現繼續並重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: However, that is not what actually happens.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這是不實際發生的狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法實際上會本身未暫停的版本取代。

trans-unit.source: Each time the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called, clock objects are created for the storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>呼叫方法時，會建立的分鏡腳本的時鐘物件。

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘發佈至所建立動畫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: So, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method is called again, it does not restart its clocks; it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法會呼叫一次，不會重新啟動其時鐘，則會取代新時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: Animations that belong to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> no longer affect the properties they once animated, regardless of their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的動畫一旦播放，就無法再對屬性產生作用，無論其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior" /> 的設定為何。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> objects that were created for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />。

trans-unit.source: Animations that belong to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> no longer affect the properties they once animated, regardless of their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的動畫一旦播放，就無法再對屬性產生作用，無論其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior" /> 的設定為何。

trans-unit.source: A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: 可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)。

trans-unit.source: All interactive actions taken on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>, and therefore also on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, occur on the next tick of the timing engine, which happens shortly before the next render.
trans-unit.target: 所執行的所有互動動作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>，因此同時在<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，會發生在下一個刻度的計時引擎下, 一個呈現之前，即會發生。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Remove%2A> method still affects the animated properties until this time.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Remove%2A>方法仍會動畫的屬性影響此時間之前。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the next time the frame is displayed, the storyboard is removed.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，會顯示在框架，在下一次分鏡腳本已移除。

trans-unit.source: If you need to disassociate an animation from a property before this time, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A> method with an `animation` parameter value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要取消關聯屬性的動畫，此時間之前，請使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.BeginAnimation%2A>方法`animation`參數值的`null`。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin(System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement,System.Boolean)" /> 方法時指定的物件。

trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含針對這個腳本及其子系所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: 屬於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的動畫一旦播放，就無法再對屬性產生作用，無論其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior" /> 的設定為何。

trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`時呼叫您用來開始分鏡腳本的互動式方法的參數。

trans-unit.target: 在到達下個時鐘刻度時，搜尋這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 直到新位置。

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that describes the amount by which the timeline should move forward or backward.
trans-unit.target: 正值或負值，這個值描述時刻表應該向前移動或向後移動的量。

trans-unit.source: Seeks this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />，直到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> performs the requested seek when the next clock tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 會在到達下個時鐘刻度時執行要求的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，搜尋作業不會分鏡腳本<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>設定納入考量。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard is treated as though it has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 分鏡腳本被視為有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 和否<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>。
